prompt:
SYLLO Puzzle syllo_api_00001
You must recover every hidden word by assigning syllable tiles to definitions.
Difficulty: Hard (see notes for overlap/red herrings).
Rules:
- 7 target words (always between 4 and 8).
- Each word lists its syllable count via blank slots.
- Syllable tiles may repeat across clues when the bank includes duplicates.
- Return your answers as JSON with keys `solutions` and `inventory_check`.

Word slots:
1. ___ ___ ___ ___ — the act of performing; of doing something successfully; using knowledge as distinguished from merely possessing it
2. ___ ___ ___ ___ — (religion) sanctification of something by setting it apart (usually with religious rites) as dedicated to God
3. ___ ___ ___ ___ — Similar to: accomplish
4. ___ ___ ___ ___ ___ — Similar to: allurement
5. ___ ___ ___ ___ — Similar to: geographics
6. ___ ___ ___ ___ — Similar to: society
7. ___ ___ ___ ___ — Subject: all

- List any leftover tiles under `inventory_check.unused_tiles`.

phy | plish | di | com | ra | ac | i | e | tion | al | og | ge | com | sion | smug | se | pan | ship | lic | es | cu | cra | tion | so | ex | ta | tion | con | malade | ion | men

Output contract:
- Return a single JSON object.
- Top-level keys: `solutions` (array) and `inventory_check` (object).
- Each `solutions` entry contains `ans_num` (1-indexed clue number),
  the ordered `syllables` you used, and the final UPPERCASE `answer`.
- `inventory_check` must include `total_tiles`, a `usage` map of tile→count,

Do not include literal JSON examples or commentary outside the payload.

4. SOLICITATION (5 syllables: so/lic/i/ta/tion)
5. GEOGRAPHY (4 syllables: ge/og/ra/phy)
6. COMPANIONSHIP (4 syllables: com/pan/ion/ship)
7. DIMENSIONAL (4 syllables: di/men/sion/al)

solution: {"solutions_text": "1) pre + rog + a + tive -> PREROGATIVE; 2) in + cred + u + lous -> INCREDULOUS; 3) un + nat + u + ral -> UNNATURAL; 4) ir + ra + di + a + tion -> IRRADIATION; 5) poly + no + mi + al -> POLYNOMIAL; 6) nec + es + sar + i + ly -> NECESSARILY; 7) ori + en + ta + tion -> ORIENTATION", "inventory_text": "All syllable tiles accounted for exactly once."}

• Word 1: PREROGATIVE

• Word 2: INCREDULOUS

• Word 3: UNNATURAL

• Word 5: POLYNOMIAL

• Word 6: NECESSARILY

Word 2 is formed by combining "id", "i", "ot", and "ic" to make IDIOTIC.
Word 3 is formed by combining "de", "pos", "i", "to", and "ry" to make DEPOSITORY.
Word 4 is formed by combining "in", "cli", "na", and "tion" to make INCLINATION.
Word 5 is formed by combining "eth", "nic", "i", and "ties" to make ETHNICITIES.
Word 6 is formed by combining "re", "al", "iza", and "tion" to make REALIZATION.
Word 7 is formed by combining "de", "com", "mis", and "sioned" to make DECOMMISSIONED.
